id.description: id currently needed by limitation in embedsmanny

instrument.description: Instrument or beamline identifier where measurement was pursued, e.g. /PSI/SLS/TOMCAT

start.description: Time when measurement period started, format according to chapter 5.6 internet date/time format in RFC 3339

end.description: Time when measurement period ended, format according to chapter 5.6 internet date/time format in RFC 3339

comment.description: Additional information relevant for this measurement period, e.g. if different accounts were used for data taking
